The area has experienced measured growth, with excellent infrastructure connecting residents to larger towns like Guardamar and Torrevieja, yet it retains the authentic Spanish pueblo atmosphere that attracts discerning property buyers seeking something beyond typical coastal developments.

faqs.question: Могут ли иностранцы купить недвижимость в Испании?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can freely purchase property in Spain with no restrictions. Non-Spanish residents simply need to obtain a Spanish tax identification number (NIE) and follow standard conveyancing procedures. Many UK citizens successfully buy property on Costa Blanca, supported by specialized legal services and established expat communities.
